1. Install the "devtools" package (if not already installed):


```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
```


2. Install the "dgeAnalysis" package:


```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("nilsmechtel/MetAlyzer")
```


3. Launch the application:


```{r, eval=FALSE}
MetAlyzer::start_app()
```
